list_variables.description: One or more user-defined key-value pairs to be added to the stack attributes                   bag.
list_variables.name: Attributes

list_variables.description: The app virtual host settings, with multiple domains separated by commas. For                   example, 'www.example.com, example.com'.
list_variables.name: Domains

variables.description: Contains the information required to retrieve an app from a repository.
variables.name: AppSource

variables.description: Whether to enable SSL for this app.
variables.name: EnableSsl

variables.description: The app short name, which is used internally by AWS OpsWorks and by Chef                   recipes.
variables.name: Shortname

variables.description: The AWS OpsWorks stack ID that this app will be associated with.
variables.name: StackId

variables.description: The app type. Each supported type is associated with a particular layer. For                   more information, see CreateApp in the AWS OpsWorks API Reference.
variables.name: Type
